verses.verse: The main point on the things being said is, we have this type of head priest, one who is seated in the right side of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens,
a minister of the Sacred Things and the tent (the true one), that the Master and not a person set up.

You see, every head priest is put in charge for the "to be offering both contributions and sacrifices" part. From this, it is essential for this person to also be having something that he might offer.
So certainly, if He were on earth, He would not even be a priest since the priests exist, the ones who offer up the contributions in line with the law,

some who minister for a demonstration and shadow of the heavenly things, just as Moses had been divinely notified as he was going to be finishing up the tent. "You see, look," He declared, "you should make everything according to the example, the one shown to you in the mountain."
But right now, He has obtained a more distinctive ministry, as much as He is also a middleman of a better treaty, something that has been implemented based on better promises.
You see, if that first treaty were faultless, the place of the second treaty would not be looked for;
for finding fault with them, He says, (in Jeremiah 31:31-34) "'Look, days are coming,' says the Master, 'and I will totally finish a new treaty over the house of Israel and over the house of Judah,

not in line with the treaty that I made with their fathers in a day when I latched on to their hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt. Because they didn't stay in My treaty, I also didn't care for them,' says the Master.

'Because this is the treaty that I will form with the house of Israel after those days,' says the Master, 'giving my laws, I will inscribe them into their mind and on their hearts. And I will be to them for a God, and they will be to Me for an ethnic group.
And they will not in any way teach (each one the person near him and each one his brother), saying, 'Know the Master,' because everyone will know Me, from a little one up to their great one,
because I will be remedied for their wrong ways, and their sins and their crimes I will not in any way remember anymore.'"
During the time to be saying, "New," He has outdated the first. What is outdated and aging is near disappearance.
